data.question: 3.JavaScript is can be written
data.a: directly into CSS file and included into HTML

data.question: 4. JavaScript is designed for following purpose -
data.b: To Execute Query Related to DB on Server
data.c: To add interactivity to HTML Pages.
data.d: To Perform Server Side Scripting Opertion

data.question: 5. Cost for Using JavaScript in your HTML is _________ .
6. JavaScript Code is written inside file having extension __________.
7. Why JavaScript is called as Lightweight Programming Language ?
data.a: because JS is available free of cost.
data.b: because we can add programming functionality inside JS
data.c: because JS is client side scripting
data.d: because JS can provide programming functionality inside but up to certain extend.
